template.name: New Item Pending Moderation (Emailing to KMC Moderators)
template.description: Email notification template to be sent when a new item is pending to be moderated by a KMC moderator.
template.subject: [Kaltura] - New Item Pending Moderation
template.body: A new item is pending your approval in the Kaltura Management Console

template.name: New Item Flagged For Moderation (Emailing to KMC Moderators)
template.description: Email notification template to be sent when an item is flagged for moderation.
template.subject: [Kaltura] - New Item Flagged For Review
template.body: A new item is flagged for review in the Kaltura Management Console

template.name: New Item Pending Moderation
template.description: Email notification template to be sent when a new item is pending moderation in a specific category (channel).
template.subject: [AppTitle] - New Item Pending Moderation
template.body: A new item is pending your approval: [ChannelSettingsPendingURLPrefix]{category_name_encoded}/{category_id}[ChannelSettingsPendingURLSuffix]

template.name: Existing Item Pending Moderation
template.description: Email notification template to be sent when a new item is pending moderation in a specific category (channel).
template.subject: [AppTitle] - Existing Item Pending Moderation
template.body: A new item is pending your approval: [ChannelSettingsPendingURLPrefix]{category_name_encoded}/{category_id}[ChannelSettingsPendingURLSuffix]

template.name: Entry Approved In Category
template.description: Email notification template to be sent when a new entry is approved in a category.
template.subject: [AppTitle] - Your Media has been approved
template.body: Your media {entry_name} [AppEntryUrl]{entry_id} has been approved to be published in {category_name}

template.name: Entry Rejected In Category
template.description: Email notification template to be sent when a new entry is rejected in a category.
template.subject: [AppTitle] - Your Media has been rejected
template.body: Your media {entry_name} [AppEntryUrl]{entry_id} has been rejected to be published in {category_name}

template.name: Entry Rejected
template.description: Email notification template to be sent when a new entry is rejected.
template.subject: [AppTitle] - Your Media has been rejected

template.name: Entry Approved
template.description: Email notification template to be sent when a new entry is approved.
template.subject: [AppTitle] - Your Media has been approved

template.name: Entry Ready
template.description: Email notification template to be sent when a new entry is ready.
template.subject: Entry is Ready for Publishing: {entry_name}/ ID: {entry_id}
template.body:
Hello,

A new entry is ready for publishing:

Entry Name: {entry_name}
Entry ID: {entry_id}
Entry Creator: {creator_name}, {creator_id}/{creator_email}

template.name: User was added to category as [role]
template.description: Email notification template to be sent when a used is added to a category with a specific role.
template.subject: [AppTitle] - You have been added to {category_name}
template.body: You have been added as {role} to {category_name}

template.name: User's role was changed in category
template.description: Email notification template to be sent when user's role is changed in category.
template.subject: [AppTitle] - Your {category_name} role has changed
template.body: Your role in {category_name} has changed and is now {role}

template.name: User was removed from category
template.description: Email notification template to be sent when user was removed from category.
template.subject: [AppTitle] - You have been removed from {category_name}

template.name: Entry was added to channel
template.description: Email notification template to be sent when entry is added to channel.
template.subject: [AppTitle] - A new media was added to {category_name}
template.body: Media {entry_name} was added to {category_name}. You can see the media here: [AppEntryUrl]{entry_id}

template.name: Comment was added to entry
template.description: Email notification template to be sent to entry creator when a comment is added to his entry.

item.description: Annotation tags contains at least one of the comment tags

template.subject: [AppTitle] - A new comment was added to your video {entry_name}
template.body: A new comment was added to your video {entry_name}.Comment: {comment_text}. You can access the video page here: [AppEntryUrl]{entry_id}

template.name: Entry Status Changed
template.description: HTTP notification template to be sent when an entry status changed.

template.name: Entry Status Equals
template.description: HTTP notification template to be sent when an entry status changed to specific value.

item.description: Entry status that triggers the event, See:KalturaEntryStatus:/api_v3/testmeDoc/?object=KalturaEntryStatus

template.name: Entry Changed
template.description: HTTP notification template to be sent when an entry metadata changed.

item.description: Entry metadata changed, columns defined in modified_columns parameter
Entry metadata columns that will trigger the event

template.name: Metadata Field Changed
template.description: HTTP notification template to be sent when a custom metadata field changed.

item.description: Custom metadata field to be compared
Custom metadata profile system name to be compared

template.name: Metadata Field Equals
template.description: HTTP notification template to be sent when a custom metadata field changed to specific value.

item.description: Custom metadata field to be compared
Custom metadata profile system name to be compared
Custom metadata field value that triggers the event

template.name: Entry-Distribution Created
template.description: HTTP notification template to be sent when a entry-distribution object created.

item.description: Distribution profile ID that triggers the event (use asterisk to all profiles)

template.name: Entry-Distribution Status Changed
template.description: HTTP notification template to be sent when a entry-distribution object status field changed.

item.description: Distribution profile ID that triggers the event (use asterisk to all profiles)

template.name: Entry Added to Category
template.description: HTTP notification template to be sent when a entry associated with category.

template.name: Entry-Category Status Changed
template.description: HTTP notification template to be sent when a entry status in category changed.

template.name: Media Entry Ready
template.description: Email notification template to be sent when a new media entry is ready.

field.code: $scope->getObject() instanceof entry && !(in_array($scope->getObject()->getType(), array(entryType::DATA, entryType::DOCUMENT))) && in_array(entryPeer::STATUS, $scope->getEvent()->getModifiedColumns()) && $scope->getObject()->getStatus() == entryStatus::READY

template.subject: Entry is Ready for Publishing: {entry_name}/ ID: {entry_id}
template.body:
Hello,

A new entry is ready for publishing:

Entry Name: {entry_name}
Entry ID: {entry_id}
Entry Creator: {creator_name}, {creator_id}/{creator_email}

template.name: Server Node Status Changed
template.description: Email notification template to be sent when a server node status is changed.
template.subject: Server Node ID: {server_node_hostname} Status Changed
template.body:
Hello,

Server node {server_node_hostname} status has changed to {server_node_status}.

template.name: CLIPPING_TASK_ENTRY_SERVER_NODE_CREATED_NOTIFICATIONS
template.description: Push notification template used by the live clipping feature
